1.0.name: wordpress/wats-ticket-id-widget
1.0.description:
This plugin is to be used with the WordPress Advanced Ticket System. It is a sidebar widget that allows the user to jump to a specific ticket by entering the ticket ID number.

It is recommended that the user select the 'Numbered (ex : 1)' option under 'Ticket numerotation' in Wats Options when using the WATS plugin, so that the IDs shown on the site match the ID you need to put into the widget form.
